desc: This function is called everytime the mouse moves.
note: Besure to call Controls("mouse") in the first line of the game !

args.name: dx
args.desc: The amount moved along the x-axis since the last time, it's a float.

args.name: dy
args.desc: The amount moved along the y-axis since the last time, it's a float.

args.name: istouch
args.desc: True if the mouse event was generated by touch.
